chapters.title: Prologue: Glimmers of the Pattern
chapters.info: Ledar, p. 81 (83)—Ogier, son of Shandin, son of Koimal. He stops in Cairhien and talks with Methin and Beldair. He arrived with Underhill, his traveling companion. The name Ledar is actually a traveling name, as is Underhill; their true identities are the Ogier Loial and the Asha'man Karldin Manfor. The real Ledar wrote A Study of Men, Women, and the One Power Among Humans about three hundred years ago. See also Koimal; Loial; Manfor, Karldin; Shandin; Underhill.
